windowData.text:
Bogdan Sychov

Frontend engineer


Location

Georgia, Tbilisi


Contacts

Phone.: +995598001908
Gmail       Telegram

Stack

  • JavaScript. ES6+
  • REST API
  • TypeScript
  • React.js v17+
  • Redux
  • Next.js / Gatsby.js
  • Vue.js v2/v3
  • Nuxt.js v2/v3
  • Storybook
  • Docker
  • CI/CD
  • GraphQL

About

With commercial development experience, I've honed my skills in JavaScript, TypeScript, React.js, Vue.js, Next.js, Nuxt.js, SPA, and SSR. I have also worked in both product and outsourcing companies, enabling me to quickly adapt to various development environments and workflows.

I've been the lead developer on several projects, where I was responsible for the entire frontend development process. This experience has taught me the importance of collaboration and effective project management, which I strive to implement in every project I work on.

In addition to my development experience, I've also had the opportunity to train interns within the company. This experience has allowed me to develop strong mentoring and leadership skills.

The preferred method of communication is telegram

You can view your resume in more detail at LinkedIn
